definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Shi2 pin3 Yao4 pin3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 ju2
containing_words.word: 国家食品药品监督管理局

pinyin: shi2 pin3 yao4 pin3 jian1 du1 ju2
Shi2 pin3 Yao4 pin3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 ju2

definition: US Food and Drug Administration authority (FDA)
pinyin: shi2 wu4 ji2 yao4 pin3 guan3 li3 ju2

sentences.english: Experts said the study should prompt countries to reconsider how they classify drugs.
sentences.chinese: 专家称，这项研究应该促使各国重新考虑药品的分类。

sentences.english: Other companies are busy with further research and development of drugs targeting CCR5.
sentences.chinese: 其他公司则忙于研发更进一步的靶向CCR5的药品。

sentences.english: They flew food and medicine to the flood-stricken area.
sentences.chinese: 他们向受洪灾的地区空运食物和药品。

sentences.english: It arranged for its importation into England with the intention of re-exporting it.
sentences.chinese: 被告意图将这批药品进口至英格兰后再转出口。

sentences.english: They're kept away from other chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 它们与其它化学药品分开贮藏。

sentences.english: Progesterex is being used together with Rohypnol, the date rape drug.
sentences.chinese: 有一种新的药品在那种地方被使用了不到一年了。

sentences.english: Why did the blonde tip-toe past the medicine cabinet?
sentences.chinese: 为什么美女踮着脚尖走过药品箱？

sentences.english: It will be given to a F.D.A. staff member annually.
sentences.chinese: 每一年它被将授予给一位食品药品管理局的员工。

sentences.english: Lyophilization(freeze-drying) is the most commonly used method for preparing solid protein pharmaceuticals.
sentences.chinese: 冷冻干燥技术是制备固体蛋白质药品的常用方法。

sentences.english: What is the difference between the contents of drugs when it is calculated on the anhydrous basis and on the dried basis?
sentences.chinese: 药品含量以干燥品计算或无水物计算有何不同？

sentences.english: The Purchasing Card for Psychotropic Drugs shall be made solely by the Ministry of Public Health.
sentences.chinese: 精神药品购用卡》由卫生部统一制定。

sentences.english: She would help them with meals, and carefully screen their medicine .
sentences.chinese: 她开始帮着他们进餐，仔细地帮他们整理和筛选药品。

sentences.english: Apply to food, medicine, cosmetics and other industries.
sentences.chinese: 适用于食品，药品，化装品等行业。

sentences.english: There are currently no drugs or vaccines available to treat Hendra virus infection.
sentences.chinese: 目前没有能够用于治疗亨德拉病毒感染的药品或疫苗。

sentences.english: She presents a tray with small paper cups filled with medication.
sentences.chinese: 她托着一个医护托盘，上面的小纸杯内装着药品。

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
delivery mechanism of a medicine (e.g. pill, powder etc)
